search.title: Find Available Rides
add.title: Add a Ride
rides.title: My Upcoming Rides
rides.emptyState.title: No rides found
rides.emptyState.description: You don't have any upcoming rides. Create a new ride or join an existing one!
profile.edit.modal.title: Edit Profile
profile.edit.modal.descriptions: Please add your phone number to create a ride. This helps other riders contact you.
settings.title: Settings
settings.language.title: Select Language
register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Join GetRide to start sharing and finding rides!
error.screen.title: Access Restricted
error.screen.description: To access this content, please log in to your account. If you don't have an account yet, you can create one in just a few steps
about.title: About GetTremp
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: GetTremp was created to make ride-sharing between people easier. The app connects drivers and passengers in a simple and convenient way, saving time, fuel, and costs.
about.social.title: Social Application
about.social.description: We believe in the power of community and collaboration. The app encourages social connections and mutual help, while contributing to environmental quality and reducing road congestion.
about.contact.title: Contact Us
about.contact.description1: You took a ride using the app — tell me about it, I’d love to hear!
about.contact.description2: Have questions or suggestions for improvement? I'd love to hear from you!
